text: CNBLUE is a South Korean rock band formed in Seoul in 2009. There are three members: Jung Yong-hwa (lead vocals, rhythm guitar), Lee Jong-hyun (lead guitar, vocals), Lee Jung Shin (bass guitar, vocals) and Kang Min-hyuk (drums, vocals). They have toured in South Korea and Japan. == Other websites == * CNBLUE official website Category:2009 establishments in South Korea Category:Rock bands Category:South Korean rock bands
title: CNBLUE
